hero.title: Pricing
hero.subtitle: A sacred path, never transactional.
hero.description: This work is offered with reverence, discernment, and deep presence. Pricing reflects the time, preparation, energetic holding, and integration required for a safe and meaningful initiation—while remaining aligned with local realities in Mexico.
hero.quote: No one is ever turned away for genuine calling and readiness.

journeyPackages.title: Journey Packages
journeyPackages.description: Complete pathways for those who feel called to walk deeper.

complete.title: Complete Journey
complete.description: The most balanced and supportive arc

deepWork.title: Deep Work Container
deepWork.description: For those ready for profound, sustained transformation

journeyPackages.note: Insight without integration is just spiritual entertainment. This is the work of a lifetime.

individualServices.title: Individual Services
individualServices.description: Each phase of the journey can also be engaged separately

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Optional but highly recommended for first-time participants

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: A sacred passage into remembrance. Held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and full presence.
ceremony.item5: Full day of care and post-ceremony rest
ceremony.note: Ceremony dates are only offered after preparation and mutual discernment.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Insight becomes embodiment. Anchoring remembrance into daily life.

retreats.title: Retreat Immersions
retreats.description: Multi-day containers for complete transformation in sacred space

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.subtitle: When the call is genuine, we walk together.
accessibility.description: If you feel the medicine is part of your path but finances are a barrier, speak openly. We honor sincerity, readiness, and mutual discernment over money.

slidingScale.title: Accessibility Options
slidingScale.item1: Sliding scale available based on financial situation
slidingScale.item2: If finances are a barrier, speak openly

accessibility.quote: No one is ever turned away for genuine calling and readiness.

medicalNote.title: Medical Screening Required
medicalNote.description: Safety is sacred. All participants must complete a medical questionnaire and review before any ceremony.

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.description: If you feel the call, begin with the application process. This is an invitation to discernment—for both of us. Not everyone is a fit. And that's sacred.
cta.disclaimer: Private application · Discernment process · Medical screening required
